mcq.statement: Who were among the leaders of the Khilafat Movement?

options.a: Maulana Shaukat Ali and Mohammad Ali Jauhar
options.b: Maulana Zafar Ali Khan and Hasrat Mohani

mcq.one_liner: Prominent leaders of the Khilafat Movement included **Maulana Shaukat Ali, Mohammad Ali Jauhar, Maulana Zafar Ali Khan, Hasrat Mohani, and Abul Kalam Azad**.
